name: Clot!
description:
You play as a little blob of black goo trying to survive hordes of enemies while simultaneously matching blocks to score points.

Be careful not to run out of space as the circle closes and the blocks accumulate!
Combine blocks of the same color in vertical or horizontal lines of three or more to earn gems and free up space.

The music is "the only me is me" by threechainlinks.com

Controls:

Move:                                WASD
shoot:                                mouse left click
Dash/push blocks:    mouse right click

Restart :                           R

(Xinput gamepad also supported)

This was my  first submisson for the LDJAM (42) based on the theme "running out of space".

Hope you have fun playing it!
